mapper.select: SELECT doc.doctor_id, doc.doctor_name, dept.dept_name, doc.license_no, doc.phone, doc.created_at FROM doctor doc JOIN department dept on doc.dept_id = dept.dept_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor (doctor_name, department, license_no, phone, created_at) VALUES (#{doctorName}, #{department}, #{licenseNo}, #{phone}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE doctor SET doctor_name= #{doctorName}, department= #{department}, phone= #{phone} WHERE doctor_id= #{doctorId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.consult_fee AS consultFee, d.insurance_rate AS insuranceRate FROM doctor a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE a.doctor_id = #{doctorId}
